subject: Art & Design
title: Target Audience: Designing for Someone Specific
description: A short lesson to help you apply Target Audience: Designing for Someone Specific.

hook.text: 'Our target audience is everyone.' That's the fastest way to reach nobody. Specificity is a superpower.

buildup.text: A target audience is the specific group a brand designs for: defined by demographics, psychographics, and behavior.

discovery.text: Personas â€” fictional detailed profiles of ideal customers â€” help designers make decisions: 'Would Sarah use this?'

twist.text: Designing for a narrow audience often attracts a broader one. Slack targeted teams but became mainstream.

climax.text: Liquid Death water targets punk/metal fans. Its brutal branding repels some and magnetically attracts its people.

punchline.text: The brands that try to please everyone delight no one.

quiz.question: Why can targeting a narrow audience attract a broader one?
options: Strong, specific branding creates passionate fans who spread the word
Narrow audiences are always larger than expected
Advertising algorithms only work with narrow targeting
